events.text: ...You've finally arrived at your seat, son.
Well, sorry 'ta drop this on ya now, but your stop's already here.
Not like ya ever had the luxury of being able to sit and mull everything over.
None of the decisions ya made were easy; there weren't any right answers.
Where to live, whether or not to love, what passion ya pursue... it all hits ya quick and ya gotta decide your direction.
No point in regretting anything now. Yer direction's been set in stone. As long as ya have conviction you can make your path work.
Thanks for ridin' with us son. See ya whenever... somewhere.
